titleStmt.title: En oligo christianos, the almost Christian discovered, or, The false-professor tried and cast being the substance of seven sermons, first preached at Sepulchres, London, 1661, and now at the inportunity of friends made publick / by Matthew Meade.
titleStmt.author: Mead, Matthew, 1630?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
